structure.unit: Chapter 17C METROPOLITAN DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF MOBILE HOMES AND REMOVAL OF DEBRIS FROM MOBILE HOME PARKS RENDERED UNINHABITABLE BY HURRICANE ANDREW AFTER ITS AFTERMATH

text.section:
Sec. 17C-1. Authority to enact.
This chapter is enacted under and pursuant to the provisions of the Home Rule Charter of Government for Dade County, Florida, the proclamations of the County Manager and the Governor of the State of Florida declaring a state of emergency, and the police powers inherent in county government to protect the health, safety and welfare of the citizens of Dade County, Florida.
